entry.title: Response from HR
entry.summary:
Author: SimplyAnotherWriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,982Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 1,485

Summary: Marinette only agreed to work at WE because Jagged and Penny insisted that it would be okay. They reassured her that they had scouted the company out just as thoroughly as she had taught them to, and so there shouldn't be any problems.And there wasn't! At least...Not until her Boss and his family decided to keep hovering over her 24/7, with one son acting like an overprotective brother, and another son constantly showing up and clinging to her(he had no right to have such a pretty face!!!).o0oOo0oPART 2! The extended version of Part 1~

entry.title: Heirs
entry.summary:
Author: otome_wandering

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 215,931Chapters: 16/55Kudos: 1,260

Summary: Marinette is the Star of the Order of the Miraculous, the still-in-training head, as well as the True Ladybug leading the Court of Miracles. After years at Hawkmoth's mercy, Marinette has decided that enough is enough and is reaching out to Batman, the detective of detectives to help her track down the villian's true identity. What better way to do this than a field trip to Gotham?Damian, the bloodson and heir to both the Cowl and the Demon's Head, wants nothing to do with the French Class who has won the Wayne Enterprises Summer Internship, yet his father insists he needs better interpersonal skills. He supposes it won't kill him to try to work with this supposedly skilled class president if it means that everyone will get off his back for being 'aggressively asocial' (although he will still keep NDAs on standby).A seal of fate, a blood right, and a hidden prophecy lead Marinette and Damian on a rollercoaster of emotions, humourous misunderstandings, comeuppance -- and marriage?!___Basically my attempt at a soulmate AU, full of just about every Damianette cliche and trope I can think of. And some original lore to make it work.Updating MonthlyMaribat Awards 2024 Winner x5

But the young half ghost and guardian are two sides of a coin, chosen champions of life and death in a game they don’t yet know. And something from the shadows is hunting them both.Will the Bats realise they are needed before it’s too late?

entry.title: The Guild of The Forsaken
entry.summary:
Author: Morcitylights

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 209,843Chapters: 46/?Kudos: 1,231

Summary: Ravenhold Prison. A place created specifically to confine people with immeasurable magical powers. It was built to never be found.Majority of those detained at Ravenhold are deemed to be psychopaths, powerful beings who take joy in wiping out entire civilisations. The multitude of manuscripts showcasing their various offences are testament to this fact. The people kept at Ravenhold have the magical potential to rip apart the very fabric of reality and reshape it to their will. Marinette Dupain-Cheng is one of these people. Rated M for Murder

entry.title: The final battle
entry.summary:
Author: Redrover26

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,133Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 151

Summary: Ladybug loses the final battle. Chat noir turns to hawkmoth's side. The consequences of ladybug losing. What will happen if marinette dies in the final battle of Hawkmoth versus Ladybug and happens to get revived in the pit. Marinette forgets who she is lost in the darkness trained to become a weapon. The League of Assassins most powerful warrior. The Justice League's most powerful enemy. Damian questions who he truly is, as a person without the league or Batfam who Damian truly is.

entry.title: The Girl from Paris
entry.summary:
Author: FelicisMagic18873

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,154Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 1,040

Summary: For a second, just a single second, Marinette imagined doing nothing.Imagined standing there with the rest of the class and just watching as blood splattered on the floor, secure in the knowledge that no one could blame her for not stepping in.After all, it wasn't Paris. She wasn't Ladybug, and Lila had been picked randomly from their group to be held at gunpoint.

entry.title: letters to lovers (and the aftermath of cherry wine)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 145,379Chapters: 37/?Kudos: 3,106

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng and Damian Wayne-Al Ghul are pen-pals for three years, during that time, Marinette slowly but surely falls in love (and Damian falls with her). Damian has to heal from his childhood and Marinette is still changing from growing pains; they are leaving partners and friends and toxicity and gods behind them.**Warning: reading this may cause whiplash-inducing criterion shift.You will no longer view anger as mad or friends the same way. Your concepts of "childhood" and "the right thing" will forever be changed. You will not be able to change it back.The average species lasts four million years on earth. We've been around for 300,000 of those years, but our ancestors were born six million years ago. To live you must adapt; change. Are you changing? What does that say about you?Reading this may cause delusions. You might start seeing ghosts. Or get a therapist.

entry.title: The War of Balance
entry.summary:
Author: NightingaleRose2023

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,357Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 141

Summary: The League of Assassins has declared war against the Order of the Guardians, forcing the Miraculous Court, and their beloved leaders, Marinette and Damian, on a mission, a race against time, to recollect the remaining forgotten and missing miraculi around the globe.However, the aftermath of their previous war has created ripples...and with their current fight leading them far too close to a past life, worlds may collide. After all... The Al Ghul line will do anything to emerge victorious...(This is book two of my series, so for this story to make sense, please read book one before reading this one.)
